# init

**Instance Method**

Initializes an instance of the audio box class.

## Declaration

```swift
bool init(IOUserAudioDriver * in_driver, bool in_is_acquirable, OSString * in_box_uid);
```

## Parameters

- **in_driver**: The [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDriver] that owns this object.
- **in_is_acquirable**: A Boolean value that specifies if the box supports being acquired.
- **in_box_uid**: The name of the box, as an [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/DriverKit/OSString].

## Return Value

`true` if initialization succeeded; `false` otherwise.

## Discussion

Always pass in the [doc://com.apple.audiodriverkit/documentation/AudioDriverKit/IOUserAudioDriver] and arguments. The no-argument ``IOUserAudioBox/init```()`always returns`false`.

## Creating an Audio Box

- **Create**: Allocates and initializes an instance of the audio box class.
- **IOUserAudioDriver**: A DriverKit provider object that manages communications with an audio device.
